name: RefleX (itch) (AnDevX)
description:
A speed testing game where you have to press the coloured button as they blink. 

Get your reaction speed, stats and unlock different settings.

[Features]
- Calculate your reflex in milliseconds
- Reach new high score for new unlocks
- Two difficulties
- Three Game modes
- Speed from 1 second to 0.1 seconds (Human fastest reaction is at 0.15!)
- Progressively harder, infinite gameplay
- Simple arcade games
- 4 buttons to press as they blink
- Easy to play, hard to master
